Title: Long Time Coming
Plot: Bette seeks Tina's advice on how to get Jodi back, but is surprised to learn that Tina no longer wants to be straight. Alice is devastated when Tasha is called in for another tour in Iraq. Meanwhile, Phyllis seeks divorce, Jenny is excluded in any decisions regarding the movie, and Helena frees herself from her entanglement with Catherine.
GuestStars: Karin Konoval,  Ben Ayres,  Toshi Reagon,  Aidan Jarrar,  Jackson Allan,  Jon Wolfe Nelson,  Cybill Shepherd,  Erin Daniels,  Heather Matarazzo,  Jane Lynch,  Annabella Sciorra,  Kristanna Loken,  Olivia Windbie
